Literature.Title: The anti-staphylococcal lipolanthines are ribosomally synthesized lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Wiebach V, Mainz A, Siegert MJ, Jungmann NA, Lesquame G, Tirat S, Dreux-Zigha A, Aszodi J, Le Beller D, Süssmuth RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus Smith ATCC 13709(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1683(MIC=0.46µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 33400(MIC=0.15µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>25µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>25µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris DSM 13387(MIC=>25µg/ml),Serratia marcescens DSM 30121(MIC=>25µg/ml)
